text: قَالَ مَا مَكَّنِّي فِيهِ رَبِّي خَيۡرٞ فَأَعِينُونِي بِقُوَّةٍ أَجۡعَلۡ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ رَدۡمًا
translation: 95. Dilqharneyni Yi Rabbi reedaa kee maali duddak yoh yeceeh yoh arciseemit isin maaluk yoh taceenim faxxaanamak taysehik isin sinni maqarat yoo cata, sin fan kee ken fanat kaxxa reebuy (edeedu) maqarre heeyyok keenik iyye.
